uvi.description:
scsi: core: Fix error handling of scsi_host_alloc()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.44 by commit 7a696ce1d5d16a33a6cd6400bbcc0339b2460e11. For more details please see the references link.
